name: Hell Roll
description:
READMEPLS!!!

This is you. A HELLRAISER That's a Familiar. He flies and bites.
That's a Porter. He runs and shoots.
That's a Warden. He stands and shoots from afar.

That's a LUCIFER. He's watching.

They will try to kill you. Again and again.

The Hearts will heal you. The Saws will harm you.
Attribute choice

Each run you roll the dice on how strong each of your 7 attributes are. First, 3 attributes are rolled, then 2, then 2 once again.You can't control which attributes are rolled, but each time you can determine which dice number goes to which attribute. You can't go back and reroll if you changed your mind during the process of bulding the HELLRAISER. You get what you get

Controls

You move with WASD. 

You shoot with LMB. 

You dash with SPACE. 

You stun with RMB. 

TRY YOUR LUCK AND RUN GAME

Authors:
